entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
